overwatch.util

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • overwatch.util.Console

  • public class Console
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides basic console input functions with a variety of constraints. These functions can't fail: they loop forever until input matching the constraints is provided.
    Version:
    4
    Author:
    Lee Coakley

      • getDoubleLowerBound

        public static double getDoubleLowerBound(java.lang.String prompt,
                         double lowest)
        Safely get double input with inclusive lower limit.
        Parameters:
        prompt - The message to show when getting this input.
        lowest - Lowest number allowed.
        Returns:
        A value guaranteed to be a valid integer >= 'lowest'.
